description.en-us: '70 Dodge Hemi Challenger Debut series 2006 First Editions Produced 2006 - Present Designer Phil Riehlman Number J3270

specs.tampo: Black Side Stripe, Black Grille, Purple + Black Shaker Hood, Challenger in Silver, Painted Side Marker Lights, Silver Door Handles
Black Side Stripe, Black Grille, Green + Black Shaker Hood, Challenger in Silver, Painted Side Marker Lights, Silver Door Handles

Satin Black Roof, Silver Window Trim, Satin Black + Orange Opening Shaker Hood, Challenger in Black + Silver, Light and trim details
Challenger in Dark Gray, Light and trim details

Dark yellow flames & one black stripe on sides, "Challenger" & "R/T" on sides & rear, black hood & roof, "6.1 HEMI" on black hood scoop, "Dodge" on rear, "PHOOK" on rear California license plate, painted front turn lights, headlights, & rear taillights

releases.notes: 3,000 produced HWC.com convention series Production code(s): 0717AZ
